WORK WITH US

JOB POSITION AVAILABLE

SEND US YOUR CV AND GET READY TO JOIN THE TEAM

Engineerings

Robotic Software Engineer
(Full time)
APPLY

Overview: 

ARV is a subsidiary under PTTEP to response the rapid growing digital technologies. We aim to become the most trusted partner to businesses and governments across ASEAN countries enabling them to capitalize on emerging AI & Robotics technologies. Our AI and robotics innovations aim to serve the energy, environment, agriculture, and security sectors. Headquartered in Bangkok and with networks across AI & Robotics domestic and international, we are uniquely positioned to bring the best possible AI & Robotic solutions to business challenges and maximize every opportunity. 

The Robotic Software Engineer is part of the core project team. He/she must collaborate with the entire team and all stakeholders, including internal workforce, contractors, and customers. Work quality, cost efficiency, innovation & creativity, and time-to-market are critical success factors. The robotic software engineer must have the ability to perform basic research, carry out software engineering, integrate and apply existing technologies into a prototype as well as to finalize product/application. 

Responsibilities: 

  • Design, implement, and test software in robot system.
  • Write software on embedded system or desktop.
  • Work closely with mechanical and embedded system team.
  • Participate integration test and field test with the team.
  • Able to manage documentation/paperwork proactively.

Qualifications: 

  • Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Computer engineering, Computer science or similar technical discipline.
  • Good skill of using Linux command.
  • Good skill of software development on both Windows and Embedded Linux.
  • Good skill of using ROS.
  • Good understand of the following topics: Computer vision, Object recognition, SLAM, 3D reconstruction, machine learning, robot navigation algorithm, robot object avoidance algorithm, robot path planning algorithm, control algorithm.
  • Good understanding in principle of communication system especially above the network layer.
  • Understanding in mathematic equations and able to convert into coding.
  • Minimum of 5 years experiences in related field (academic experience such as senior project, robot competition, research in related field can be counted).
  • TOEIC score 550 as minimum.

Advantages if you:

  • Good comprehension in data science.
  • Good skill in using data science tools such as TensorFlow and Cloud Platform.
  • Good skill of using MATLAB.
  • Good skill in mobile application developments on Android or IOS.
  • Experiences in mobile robot development such as UAV, ROV, AUV or rescue robot.

APPLY
Robotic Embedded System Engineer
(Full time)
APPLY

Overview:

ARV is a subsidiary under PTTEP to response to the rapid growing digital technologies. We aim to become the most trusted partner to businesses and governments across ASEAN countries enabling them to capitalize on emerging AI & Robotics technologies. Our AI and robotics innovations aim to serve the energy, environment, agriculture, and security sectors. Headquartered in Bangkok and with networks across AI & Robotics domestic and international, we are uniquely positioned to bring the best possible AI & Robotic solutions to business challenges and maximize every opportunity.

The Robotic Engineer is part of a core project team. He/she must collaborate with the entire team and all stakeholders, including internal workforce, contractors, and customers. Work quality, cost efficiency, innovation & creativity, and time-to-market are critical success factor. The robotic engineer must have the ability to perform basic research, carry out engineering design, integrate and apply existing technologies into a prototype and further to final product/application.

Responsibilities:

· Design, implement, and test electrical components on robots such as power management, motor driver, RF module, etc.

· Write software on microcontroller or embedded Linux board to control mechatronic systems

· Design electronic circuit

· Work closely with software and mechanical team

· Participate integration test and field test with team

· Manage documentation/paperwork proactively.

Qualifications:

· Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Electrical engineering, Mechatronic engineering or similar technical discipline

· Good skill of using PCB design software such as Altium-Designer

· Good skill of C/C++ programming on microcontroller or embedded Linux board

· Good skill of Electronic design such as logic gate, op-amp circuit, filter design, power supply, motor driver

· Good understand control algorithm such as PID, Fuzzy logic, Feed forward

· Good understand principle of communication system such as modulation, protocol, RF bandwidth, Network.

· Understand mathematic equation and has ability to transform into code

· Understand the principle of Operation System – OS

· Good skill of using light workshop tool

· Good skill in soldering and de-soldering component on PCB

· Experience minimum 2 years in related field (academic experience such as senior project, robot competition, research in related field can be counted)

· TOEIC score 550 as minimum

Advantage if you:

· Good skill of using electronic simulation software such as PSPICE

· Good skill of using MATLAB

· Good skill in FPGA design

· Good skill in Digital Signal Processing – DSP

· Good skill of using electrical measurement tool

· Experience in using coding version control tool such as SVN, Github

· Experience in mobile robot development such as UAV, ROV, AUV or rescue robot

· Understand with any of the following topic: Object recognition, SLAM, 3D reconstruction, machine learning, sensor fusion, motion control and DSP, ROS

APPLY
Robotic Mechanical Engineer
(Full time)
APPLY

Overview:

The Robotic Mechanical Engineer is part of a core project team. He/she must collaborate with the entire team and all stakeholders, including internal workforce, contractors, and customers. Work quality, cost efficiency, innovation & creativity, and time-to-market are critical success factor. The robotic engineer must have the ability to perform basic research, carry out engineering design, integrate and apply existing technologies into a prototype and further to final product/application.

Responsibilities:

· Design, implement, and test mechanical components on robot such as robot arms, wheels system, enclosure, pneumatic system.

· Draw 3D CAD of robot mechanical components

· Work closely with software and embedded system team

· Participate integration test and field test with team

· Manage documentation/paperwork proactively

Qualifications:

· Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical engineering, Aerospace engineering, Mechatronic engineering or similar technical discipline

· Good skill of using mechanical 3D CAD/CAM design software such as Autodesk inventor, Autodesk fusion.

· Good skill of using mechanical workshop tools

· Good understand principle of stress analysis, CFD, heat transfer and has ability to proceed the simulation

· Good understand principle of mechanical parts machining procedure and its limitation

· Experience minimum 2 years in related field (academic experience such as senior project, robot competition, research in related field can be counted)

· TOEIC score 550 as minimum

Advantage if you:

· Good skill of using CNC

· Good skill in drawing 3D surface and meshes

· Good skill of using MATLAB

· Good understand control algorithm such as PID, Fuzzy logic, Feed forward

· Experience in mold design for fiber glass or carbon fiber

· Experience in mobile robot development such as UAV, ROV, AUV or rescue robot

· Understand with any of the following topic: Object recognition, SLAM, 3D reconstruction, machine learning, sensor fusion, motion control and DSP

APPLY
Data Engineer
(Full time)
APPLY

What you’ll do:

  • Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using big data technologies
  • Develops and maintains scalable data pipelines and builds out new API integrations to support continuing increases in data volume and complexity
  • Designs data integrations and data quality framework
  • Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability,
  • Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements
  • Works closely with all business units and engineering teams to develop strategies for long term data platform architecture

What we’re looking for in you:

  • At least 3-year experience in data science and engineering
  • Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.
  • Experience building and optimizing big data pipelines, architectures, and data sets.
  • Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc
  • Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc
  • Knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable big data stores.
  • Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on the company’s success
  • Self-development skills to keep up to date with fast-changing trends

What we offer:

  • 5-day work week
  • Flexible working time
  • Free snacks, fruits, and drinks
  • Performance bonus
  • Health and life insurance
  • Provident fund
  • A great working environment
  • An office close to BTS (2-minute walk)
  • A 16-inch MacBook Pro

APPLY
QA ENGINEER
(Full Time)
APPLY

What you’ll do:

  • Reviewing software requirements and preparing test scenarios
  • Detect and track software defects and inconsistencies
  • Define and lead quality best practices and activities
  • Manage test plans, test execution, and test reports
  • participate in requirement analysis, design reviews, and providing input on requirements, product design, and potential problems.
  • Design and develop automation scripts when needed
  • Work closely with other team members and departments to ensure the success of products

What we’re looking for in you:

  • Up-to-date knowledge of software test design and testing methodologies.
  • Passion in software products, start-ups, and cutting-edge technology
  • Good understanding of automation tools such as Cucumber, Robot Framework, Postman, Selenium WebDriver, etc.
  • Self-development skills to keep up to date with fast-changing trends
  • Experience with agile software development and cross-functional team environment
  • Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on the company’s success
  • Experience using Jira or other issues tracking software
  • Familiar with designing, implementing automatic testing, functional and performance testing
  • High attention to details

What we offer:

  • 5-day work week
  • Flexible working time
  • Free snacks, fruits, and drinks
  • Performance bonus
  • Health and life insurance
  • Provident fund
  • A great working environment
  • An office close to BTS (2-minute walk)
  • A 16-inch MacBook Pro

APPLY
Machine Learning Engineer
(Full time)
APPLY

What you’ll do:

• Providing supervision and guidance to software engineering teams

• Perform code reviews to identify basic technical and logical errors

• Continually researching current and emerging technologies and proposing changes where needed

• Develop best practices to improve productivity and utilize programming principles, tools, and techniques to write solution codes.

• Developing high-level product specifications with attention to system integration and feasibility

• Ensure software meets all requirements of quality, security, modifiability, extensibility etc

• Work closely with other team members and departments to ensure the success of products

What we’re looking for in you:

• At least 7-year experience in software development

• Excellent knowledge of software and application design and architecture

• Experience developing IT and cloud infrastructure

• Experience coding in various languages (C#, PHP, Java, JavaScript, etc.)

• Passion in software products, start-ups, and cutting-edge technology

• Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on the company’s success

• Experience with agile software development and cross-functional team environment

• Familiarity with Jira or other project management tools

• Excellent communication skills, growth mindset, teamwork, and ability to drive for result

What we offer:

• 5-day work week

• Flexible working time

• Free snacks, fruits, and drinks

• Performance bonus

• Health and life insurance

• Provident fund

• A great working environment

• An office close to BTS (2-minute walk)

• A 16-inch MacBook Pro

APPLY
Product Owner
(Full time)
APPLY

What you’ll do:

  • Define product vision, road-map and growth opportunities
  • Translates product roadmap features into well-defined product requirements including features, user stories, and acceptance test criteria
  • Conduct user research and market research to strategically identify the right features to develop
  • Supervise and advise the software development team to meet software expectations
  • Plan and prioritize product backlog and development for the products
  • Work closely with other team members and departments to ensure the success of products

What we’re looking for in you:

  • At least 4-year experience in digital product development
  • Passion in software products, start-ups, and cutting-edge technology
  • Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on the company’s success
  • Experience with agile software development and cross-functional team environment
  • Familiarity with Jira or other project management tools
  • Excellent communication skills, growth mindset, teamwork, and ability to drive for result
  • Self-development skills to keep up to date with fast-changing trends

APPLY

DEVELOPER

Frontend Developer
(Full time)
APPLY

What you’ll do:

  • Determine the structure and design of web pages
  • Work on building new features, bug fixing and improving application performance
  • Turn prototypes into real features or applications
  • Participate in the full software development life-cycle
  • write reusable code and to a standard which makes it quick and easy to maintain the code in the future
  • Work closely with other team members and departments to ensure the success of products

What we’re looking for in you:

  • At least 1-year experience in web development
  • An understanding of continuous delivery software development
  • Good UX and design sensibilities
  • Hands-on experience of frontend development technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SASS, AJAX, JSON, and ES6+.
  • Strong knowledge of modern JavaScript frameworks or libraries such as Vue.js and Vuex or React and Redux.
  • Experience with source/version control such as SVN & Git
  • Experience with agile software development and cross-functional team environment
  • Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on the company’s success
  • Self-development skills to keep up to date with fast-changing trends
  • Knowledge of prototyping and design tools such as Adobe XD, Adobe Photoshop, Invision, Figma, etc is a plus

What we offer:

  • 5-day work week
  • Flexible working time
  • Free snacks, fruits, and drinks
  • Performance bonus
  • Health and life insurance
  • Provident fund
  • A great working environment
  • An office close to BTS (2-minute walk)
  • A 16-inch MacBook Pro
